t: Sloan Valve Company - Wikipedia
s: January 3, 2025 - Sloan Valve Company is a privately held American company specializing in plumbing valves and fixtures. The company was founded by William Elvis Sloan in Chicago, Illinois in 1906 with the introduction of the Royal flushometer, a valve to release a measured amount of water to flush a urinal ...
